title: Error 1935 when trying to install LoL on laptop
body:
In Army AIT as a 74D so I bought an Asus Republic of Gamers laptop since I can't have my gaming tower for obvious reasons. When I downloaded league on my tower, I had ZERO issues.

Now, all the sudden, on this brand new laptop. I get Error 1935 and its  annoying. Wtf? I downloaded all my steam games just fine. I tried doing what I keep reading online and downloaded Windows C++ Redistributable  separate, but I get Error 1935 for that too! WTF!?!?!!?? How the heck am I suppose to get download LoL if I cant download the other crap required for LoL? Makes no sense. I am running Windows 10 64bit if that helps. Anything I would appreciate

replies.body:
You were correct in assuming this was caused by the Visual C++ component. This can often be resolved by first, updating windows. Afterwards, you should remove all existing versions of Visual C++ 2005 on your PC, then install a fresh version [from here.](http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=3387)

Let me know if this fixed it.
